name: Ben Murray
description:
I am a good listener, kind, warm, caring, forgiving, reliable, responsible, honest, optimistic. I am a doer not a dreamer. As an honest, kind, and loving man, I seek a woman that shares these same qualities. I believe the foundation of a loving relationship is built on trust, appreciation, and mutual respect. If you agree, I would enjoy hearing from you!
i am looking for somebody who will respect me and care about me
